title: WATCH | Ever wondered what a cold glass of avo ale tastes like? It's the latest obsession at this bar
text:

Avocados fall into the super foods category.

They are the multi-talented superstars of fruits with their high nutritional value and the ability to go on just about anything. If you are one of those individuals that doesn't like avos this might not be for you.

But this Los Angeles bar has taken the love for avocados to a whole new level by creating a beer with the main ingredient being the unique fruit. Considering that avos hardly have a taste, you might be wondering how it will feel having this drink go down your throat.

This video will give you an idea of what a cold glass of avocado ale tastes like.
